ctx: apply ex_lim_seq_decr in Hdecr as Hexists.
exceptions.tactic: apply is_lim_seq_decr_compare with (l := l) in Hbounded; auto.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (u : nat -> R) (l : R), is_lim_seq u l -> (forall n : nat, u (S n) <= u n) -> forall n : nat, l <= u n" on hypothesis of type "forall n : nat, M <= u n".

original: intros Hdecr Hbounded. apply ex_lim_seq_decr in Hdecr as Hexists. destruct Hexists as [l Hl]. exists l. apply is_lim_seq_decr_compare with (l := l) in Hbounded; auto.
